a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Population change from the start to the end of the calendar year (1 July to 30 June). Historic estimates from 1950 to 2021, and projected to
2100 based on the UN medium-fertility scenario.
Data source: United Nations, World Population Prospects (2022)
